Header: National Cinema Day to be declared on Birth Centenary of Dr.Lester James Peiris
Content: The Birth Centenary of Dr. Lester James Peiris falls tomorrow. Minister SajithPremadasa has said that as a tribute to Lester James Peiris, a National Cinema Day will be commemorated on the 05th of April every year. Addressing a news conference in Colombo today, the Minister said that several special programmes are being planned for implementation tomorrow in memory of him. The Minister said that the gazette notification with respect to the declaration of the National Cinema Day on 05th April has been issued. Spending fifteen million rupees work on a Museum and a Library in his name will be launched tomorrow at the Film Corporation premises. Work has also commenced on a model village in the name of Lester James Peiris in the Hambanthota District. The Minister said that they also planned to build 24 model villages in the other Districts took in his name and pay the highest tribute to Dr. Lester James Peiris.
